summary: The diff shows modifications to the header logo implementation (Layout.tsx) and documentation updates (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json). Since the BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, no missing requirements can be identified. However, the implemented feature (custom header logo with uploaded image) appears to be a hallucinated feature as it was not requested in the provided BuildRequest.
